ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:14 [Issue ID 4000-103734] urn:comicvine:4000-103734 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 06:44:35. [Issue ID 103734]
ComicInfo.Summary: Last issue saw the revelation of the Puritans, a secretive and highly technologically advanced organization whose sole purpose is to eradicate all Kherubim and Daemonites from the face of the earth. Can Max Cash get to his brother, Grifter, in time to warn the Cats of the coming danger. What deadly secret does the Coda trained Olympia hide? Plus, introducing two new players, Mythos, the immortal human weapon, and Eve, a young woman brimming with immense psionic power.
ComicInfo.Title: Survival Of The Species, Part. 2 : Hits and Mythos
